dialogue: Quinn, why are you still calling me? You know I can't talk right now.
Then why are you still picking up?
Because I figured you'd know I'm at work, and only call if it was urgent!
I gotta get back to work. Please, only call if it's an emergency.
Okay dude. I'll try to think of an emergency to call you about.
I hang up on my friend. I should call him again if I can think of something urgent to talk about.
